Uses of Interface
net.objectzoo.delegates.Action

  • Packages that use Action 
    Package Description
    net.objectzoo.delegates
    This package contains the delegates of the Events4J API.
    net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters  
    net.objectzoo.delegates.impl  
    net.objectzoo.events.impl
    This package contains support classes that implement EventDelegates ready to be used.

    • Uses of Action in net.objectzoo.delegates

      Methods in net.objectzoo.delegates that return Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> Action<T> Action.from(Consumer<T> consumer)
      Converts the given Consumer into an Action that invokes the consumer.
      static <T> Action<T> Action.from(Function<T,?> function)
      Converts the given Function into an Action that invokes the function and then ignores its return value.
      default Action<T> Function.toAction()
      Converts this Function into an Action ignoring the function's return value.

    • Uses of Action in net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters

      Classes in net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters that implement Action 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActionToAsyncAction<T>
      An adapter that converts an Action or Consumer to a new Action, that makes an asynchronous calls to the original Action0 upon invocation.

    • Uses of Action in net.objectzoo.delegates.impl

      Classes in net.objectzoo.delegates.impl that implement Action 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActionAsyncSupport<T>
      This is an abstract support class that can be used to quickly implement asynchronous actions.

    • Uses of Action in net.objectzoo.events.impl

      Subinterfaces of Action in net.objectzoo.events.impl 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  EventAsyncDelegate<T>
      An EventAsyncDelegate implements ActionAsync as well as EventDelegate and is meant as a specification for implementations that delegate calls to the ActionAsync interface asynchronously to all subscribers of the EventDelegate interface.
      interface  EventDelegate<T>
      An EventDelegate implements Action as well as Event and is meant as a specification for implementations that delegate calls to the Action interface to all subscribers of the Event interface.
      Classes in net.objectzoo.events.impl that implement Action 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EventAsyncAdapter<T>
      The EventAsyncAdapter is class that adapts an EventDelegate to EventAsyncDelegate so that the original delegates subscribers can be invoked asynchronously.
      class  EventCaller<T>
      The EventCaller is a EventDelegate implementation that allows event distribution to a single subscriber.
      class  EventDistributor<T>
      The EventDistributor is a EventDelegate implementation that allows event distribution to multiple subscribers.
